snippet: A book by the journalist Glenn Greenwald promises fresh revelations about intelligence-gathering, but any buyer of the movie rights faces complexities.
abstract: Hollywood has been exploring the difficult non-fiction project of making a proposed film based on journalist Glenn Greenwald's planned book about whistle-blower Edward J Snowden; book promises fresh revelations about intelligence-gathering and is set for publishing in March 2014.

byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes contributed reporting from Los Angeles, and Christine Haughney from New York.

lead_paragraph: A book by the journalist Glenn Greenwald promises fresh revelations about intelligence-gathering, but any buyer of the movie rights faces complexities.

headline.main: Hollywood Ponders Movie on Book About Snowden
